entries.already_request_shuttle: You have already requested a shuttle.
entries.amount_to_spend_too_small: You must allocate more faction standing in order to earn a point of experience.
entries.bad_stuff_1: Hah, that's rich.  I had a Bothan freighter captain in my office two hours ago with the exact same piece of information.  I'm sorry, but I can't pay you for what I already know.
entries.bad_stuff_2: Three days ago our spy network confirmed the exact opposite of what you have you just told me.  I don't have time to waste on traitors and I certainly don't have time to waste on traitors who are wrong.  Good day.
entries.bribe_fail: Is this a joke?  You don't have enough money to cover your offer.
entries.bribe_success: Looks like everything is in order.  I'll see what I can do for you.  If you happen to feel generous again, you know where you can find me.
entries.buy_faction: I'd like to make a ... donation ... to your cause.
entries.checking_credit: Hold on while I validate your credit...
entries.covert_complete: You are now a Combatant. Enemy NPCs will attack you on sight but you cannot be attacked by enemy players.
entries.datapad_full: Your datapad is full.  You must first free some space.
entries.must_be_not_onleave: You can not perform that action while on leave!
entries.enemy_pilot: Wait a minute... you're an enemy pilot!  There's no way I'll let you join us!
entries.enter_training_points: Enter the amount of faction standing you wish to convert to experience.
entries.get_lost: Don't waste my time.  Come back when you know something.
entries.get_lost_faction: Don't offer money when you can't afford to pay.
entries.go_covert_confirm: Becoming covert will shield you from attacks by our enemies, but will also prevent you from initiating conflicts with them.  Are you sure you this is what you want?
entries.go_covert_yes: Very well.  We will be able to conceal your affiliation in about %DI hours.  Is there anything else with which I can help you?
entries.go_declared_confirm: If you declare your affiliation, you will become open to attack from our enemies.  Furthermore, should you change your mind, returning to your covert status is not immediate.  Are you sure you want to do this?
entries.go_declared_yes: Very well. Your affiliation is now apparent to all.  Do you need anything else?
entries.good_stuff_1: This may be exactly what we needed to know.  I'm surprised...for a piece of traitorous scum you are somewhat reliable.  Here is your payment.  Now get out of my sight.
entries.good_stuff_2: So that's why their communication lines have been quiet.  I knew they were planning something.  Here is your payment.  If you learn anything else you know where to find me.
entries.good_stuff_3: While it goes against my better judgment, this information seems to be in line with what we already know.  You've done a good job, here is your payment.  By the way, if you find any enemy orders in the field, hand them to me and I might be willing to pay you more.
entries.greeting: Greetings.  What can I do for you today?
entries.greeting_hate: I have no business with you.  You'd best be going.
entries.greeting_member: Hello, %TO.  What would you like to do?
entries.greeting_prose: Greetings.  With what can the %TO faction help you?
entries.here_you_go: Here's the latest information I've been able to get.
entries.hireling_purchase_complete: The %TT is now under your command.
entries.interested_faction_imp: A 'donation' eh?  I might see to it that certain individuals hear of your kindness and that certain materials are made available should you see fit to make such a 'donation.'
entries.interested_faction_reb: Honestly, the Rebellion is in sore need of funds.  Our operations require men, supplies, and weapons, none of which comes free.  Anything you can give would be appreciated.
entries.interested_secrets_imp_1: Yes...I've heard that you were aiding the Rebellion.  Rather good at it too: you've dealt us more than a few setbacks.  Give me a reason why I shouldn't have you arrested.
entries.interested_secrets_imp_2: Going turncoat on the Rebellion eh?  I can't say I blame you.  Rebel bases have been collapsing as fast as we can discover them.  Maybe you could help us in our efforts?
entries.interested_secrets_imp_3: You are known to me as a Rebel sympathizer.  Several patrols have your name and visual ID, in fact.  If you have useful intelligence for me, I might be able to make those patrols forget about you...and line your pockets at the same time.
entries.interested_secrets_reb_1: We occaisionally get Imperial 'sympathizers' who want to sell their information to the highest bidder.  What makes you think I'm interested in what you have to say?
entries.interested_secrets_reb_2: I get the feeling this information isn't going to be free...but I'm listening.  I've heard that you were working with the Empire and I might be willing to buy what you know.
entries.interested_secrets_reb_3: If we listened to every Imperial officer with 'information' to sell, the Rebellion would have been put down long ago.  I'll listen to what you have to say, but believe me: I know bait when I hear it.  You'll get your money only if the information is sound.
entries.invalid_response: I'm sorry.  I can't help you with that.
entries.invalid_training_type: Your training request has been aborted due to a non-allowed experience type.
entries.inventory_full: Your inventory is full, please make some room and try again.
entries.jedi_cant_go_covert: As an Enclave member, you may not go covert without first surrendering your Force Rank skills.
entries.jedi_cant_resign: You may not resign from your faction without first leaving your Enclave.
entries.join_faction_confirm: A wise decision!  Are you certain you wish to join us?
entries.join_faction_denied: I am glad you've expressed such interest in joining us.  You must, however, prove your devotion to our cause by increasing your %TO faction standing to at least %DI.
entries.join_faction_player_no: Sorry to hear it.  Speak with me again if you ever reconsider.
entries.must_be_declared: Your faction affiliation must be declared or you must be within a battlefield in order to equip that item.
entries.must_be_declared_use: Your faction affiliation must be declared in order to use that item.
entries.must_be_faction_member: You must be a member of the %TO faction in order to equip that item.
entries.must_be_faction_member_use: You must be a Special Forces or Combatant member of the %TO faction in order to use that item.
entries.nevermind: On second thought, I probably don't know enough yet to help you.
entries.no_faction: I've changed my mind, I have other things to spend my money on.
entries.no_faction_imp: You are known to be a Rebel supporter and while I do not have enough evidence to arrest you, I will find a reason to complicate your life unless you leave my sight immediately.
entries.no_faction_reb: You are a known Imperial collaborator and supporter.  I have no interest in what you have to offer.
entries.no_imp_rebel_pilots: Overt and Covert Imperials cannot become Rebel Pilots.
entries.no_items_available: There are no more items available to you for the rank of %TO.
entries.no_rebel_imp_pilots: Overt and Covert Rebels cannot become Imperial Pilots.
entries.no_secrets_1: I'm not interesting in hearing petty rumors about enemy activity.   Come back when you have something substantial.
entries.no_secrets_2: You make the fourth petty thug to try and sell me rumors this week.  If you earn the trust of our enemies, I might be interested in buying what you know, but at the moment you are simply wasting my time.  Good day.
entries.no_secrets_3: You will pardon me if I don't respect you as a source of credible information.  Earn the trust of our enemies and then I might be willing to pay you for what you know.
entries.not_enough_for_promotion: Promotion to the rank of %TO requires %DI standing over the factional minimum.  You do not yet have enough for promotion.
entries.not_enough_standing_spend: You do not have enough faction standing to spend.  You must maintain at least %DI to remain part of the %TO faction.
entries.not_member: That is only for Overt and Covert faction members.
entries.not_outside: You must be outside in order to call for a Shuttle Extraction.
entries.on_leave_complete: You are now on leave. You will not be attacked by enemy NPCs or players. Be careful as enemy crackdown troops can expose you as a member of the enemy faction. This will turn you back into a combatant.
entries.option_faction_orders: I would like to hear about what faction orders are available.
entries.option_go_covert: I would like to become a covert faction member.
entries.option_go_declared: I would like to declare my faction affiliation.
entries.option_hirelings: I would like some personnel support.
entries.option_promotion: Have I qualified for a promotion?
entries.option_purchase_items: What items are available for requisition?
entries.option_recind_resignation: I would like to rescind my resignation.
entries.order_purchase_complete: Your requisition of the %TT orders is complete.
entries.overt_complete: You are now a member of the Special Forces. You will be attacked by enemy NPCs on sight and are at risk from enemy players.
entries.promotion_confirm: Promotion to the rank of %TO requires %DI standing which I'm happy to say you meet.  Do you accept this great honor?
entries.promotion_max_rank: You have already reached the highest rank that you can.
entries.prose_reward: You have been given %DI credits in exchange for your information.
entries.resign_complete: Your resignation from the %TO faction is complete.
entries.resign_faction_confirm: We'd hate to lose you, %TU.  Your request will require %DI hours to process.  Be warned, if you resign all of your faction perks will be lost to you.  This includes your factional backpacks and anything contained within!  Are you sure you want to resign?
entries.resign_faction_no: I'm glad you changed your mind.  What would you like to do?
entries.resign_faction_yes: Very well. You will be removed from the %TO faction in %DI hours.
entries.resign_on_leave: You cannot resign while on leave.
entries.response_change_faction: I would like to quit my faction and join the %TO faction.
entries.response_join_faction: I would like to become a Covert member of your faction.
entries.response_no_to_go_covert: No. I'd rather keep my allegiance declared.
entries.response_no_to_go_declared: On second thought, I'll stay covert for now.
entries.response_no_to_join: No. I'd rather not join at this time.
entries.response_no_to_promotion: No. I'm not yet ready to accept a promotion.
entries.response_no_to_resign: No.  I will stay for now.
entries.response_promotion_complete: Congratulations, you have attained the rank of %TO!
entries.response_yes_to_go_covert: Yes, I wish to become a covert member.
entries.response_yes_to_go_declared: Yes.  I'm certain I want to declare my affiliation.
entries.response_yes_to_join: Yes. I am certain that I wish to join.
entries.response_yes_to_resign: Yes, I would like to leave the faction.
entries.response_yes_to_see_options: Yes. I would like to see what's available.
entries.schematic_purchase_complete: Schematic requisition complete. The technical readout of your new schematic has been transferred to your datapad. You may need to seek the help of a trader to use the schematic.
entries.select_item_purchase: Select the item you wish to purchase. All costs are credits.
entries.select_skill_type: Select a category in which you would like to gain experience at the cost of faction standing.
entries.sell_secrets: I may have some valuable information for you.
entries.show_item_categories: What type of items do you wish to consider?
entries.show_items: This is what we have to offer.
entries.shuttle_extract_description: Shuttle Extraction calls for an immediate evacuation of you and your group.  In most cases, response time is less than 1 minute.
entries.shuttle_initiated: Shuttle extraction procedures initiated.  Stay close to the extraction point and remain outside of buildings.  The shuttle will arrive within the next %DI seconds.
entries.shuttle_initiated_group: %TU has initiated shuttle extraction procedures.  Stay close to the extraction point and remain outside of buildings.  The shuttle will arrive within the next %DI seconds.
entries.shuttle_inside_building: You have moved inside where the shuttle has missed you!
entries.skill_training_select: Very good.  Training will help you aid us in this struggle.
entries.too_far_from_shuttle: You have moved too far from the extraction point and missed the shuttle!
entries.too_many_hirelings: You already have too much under your command.
entries.too_much_faction: I appreciate the offer, but you've done enough for us already.
entries.welcome_to_faction: A fine decision!  Welcome to the %TO faction.  Perhaps you would like to hear about our faction services?
entries.yes_faction_onek: I'll transfer twenty thousand credits into your account.
entries.yes_faction_tenk: I'll transfer one hundred thousand credits into your account.
entries.achieved_rank: You have achieved the rank of %TO
entries.demoted_rank: You have been demoted to the rank of %TO
entries.sui_delegate_faction_text: Select the amount of faction you would like the target to receive. All numeric conversions are handled as part of the transfer.  Your rank: %TT Conversion ratio: %TO Spendable faction: %DI
entries.sui_faction_resig_text: Please type 'YES' to confirm your desire to resign from your faction.  As a result of resignation, you will be stripped of rank granted by your current faction, and all factional equipment will be automatically unequipped. You will also lose all progression in your non-neutral pilot skills.  Are you really sure you wish to resign from your faction?  Enter 'YES' to confirm resignation.
entries.you_lack_faction: You lack sufficient available faction standing to train at this time.
entries.already_at_cap: You are already at your cap for %TO experience. Aborting training...
entries.increase_faction_to_convert: At your ratio of %DF:1, %DI faction points convert to less than 1 experience point.   Try increasing the amount of faction points to spend.
entries.sui_experience_training_prompt: Select the total number of experience points you would like to purchase.  Exp Type: %TT Buy Ratio: %DIfp / %TOxp
entries.sui_confirm_conversion_prompt: Convert %DF factions points to %DI points of %TO experience?
entries.sui_resig_complete_in_5: Your resignation will be completed in 5 minutes.
entries.schematic_duplicate: You already have a copy of that schematic.
entries.not_aligned: You cannot change your duty status because you are not aligned with any faction.
entries.pvp_status_changing: You are already in the process of changing your duty status.
entries.on_leave_to_covert: Acknowledged. We are currently processing your request, and you will be returned to active duty immediately.
entries.covert_to_overt: Acknowledged. We are currently processing your request, and you will be reassigned to the Special Forces unit in 30 seconds.
entries.overt_to_covert: Acknowledged. We are currently processing your request, and you will be reassigned to regular combatant duty in five minutes.
entries.dungeon_nochange: You are unable to change your status at this time.
entries.select_item_rank: For which rank would you like to see the rewards that are available to you?
entries.not_enough_credits: You do not have enough credits to purchase this: %TO.
entries.select_item_purchase_again: Would you like to purchase anything else?
